0.text:
The best thing is finding something that
you can express yourself with.

6.text: It speaks to you and brings out things in you that you couldn't ever do with words.

18.text: we've helped young people to gain confidence, self-esteem and get them back into school,

30.text: I got kicked out of all my schools,  I was on youth offenders, I was constantly watched by the police.

38.text: I was bullied quite badly in school

42.text: it got to the point where I attempted to end my own life.

47.text: I wasn't that guy who had a lot of friends.

50.text: I told them that I wanted to get involved

53.text: I've always been interested in music.

57.text: Music allowed me to escape from what was going on in my life.

63.text:
That's when I realised doing positive
things is a lot better than doing negative things.

69.text: From coming here I've learnt that music is so important.

74.text: You're getting out your deepest darkest emotions and all the fear and anxiety that you have in everyday life just disappears.

82.text: It can change someone and help them through their troubles.

86.text: I believe it's a cure and I think we need more of that around areas like this.

99.text: Recording in the sessions has given me a whole new level of confidence.

103.text: I went from an E to a D student to an A and B student.

106.text: Coming here has helped me in everything that I do.

109.text: I've expanded my ability to fit in and communicate with people.

114.text: There's no boundary to what you can and can't do.

117.text: You step on the stage and you're nervous and then you play the first chord and everything is... gone.

122.text: The adrenaline kicks in and you just go for it.

131.text: I've been on stage in front of thousands of people

134.text: but having a success story... is more thrilling than anything else.

139.text: I'm very young and I've been through a lot but I've overcome it and now I'm helping others

145.text: and I think that if Youth Music wasn't here I would have gone a long time ago.

149.text: If I didn't have music in my life I would be a very different person.

152.text: Because music is who I am now and it gives me my identity.

156.text: Music is beyond class, it's beyond age, it's the one thing that can get through any barrier.

163.text: Everyone's going through something, it's just having the right people there to support them.

168.text: I see the impact because I work with these kids every single day and I can say to them

173.text: I stopped doing all that crap... and now look where I am.

177.text: I'm proof that it saves lives.

181.text: You tell someone that you believe in them

184.text: they might just believe in themselves.
